general.name: mastargoodspec
general.description: This night contains all the high quality visit spectra in the MaStar library. Each entry in this file contains the spectrum and related information from one night of observation for a star. If a star has been observed on multiple nights, then there will be multiple entries for that star. Each entry is a combination of all of the spectra taken on that night.
general.naming_convention: mastar-goodspec-[ver1]-[ver2].fits.gz where [ver1] is the version of the MaNGA Data Reduction Pipeline (mangadrp) and [ver2] is the version of the MaStar post-processing pipeline (mastarproc).

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another
